mapper.select: select * from board order by bref desc, bre_step asc
mapper.insert: insert into BOARD values (SEQ_BOARD_BNO.nextval, #{btitle}, #{bcontent}, default, 'kh1' , (select bref from board where bno=#{bno}) , (select bre_level+1 from board where bno=#{bno}) , (select bre_step+1 from board where bno=#{bno}))
mapper.update: update board set bre_step = bre_step + 1 where bre_step > (select bre_step from board where bno=#{bno}) and bref = (select bref from board where bno=#{bno})
